title: I'm still waiting
body:
When oh when does this: 
http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091017180820/leagueoflegends/images/c/ce/Jax_Render.png

Become THIS:
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/17e30fc2359e352f1a2dbfc3f0a532b3.jpg 

*_*

Riot look at this sad fucker. He looks like a purple Christmas Tree. Give him the luv that I thought _A New Dawn_ hinted at.

replies.body: But...Our walking eggplant D:
I know, it will be hard. But I think it's time we let go.
EGGPLANT JAX...RITO PLZ
Eggplant Jax, Banana Soraka, and Orange Ziggs need to be a thing.
Citrus Gangplank*
eat an orange and be k
Seriously though, can we at least get a ninja turtle skin? Look at those hands! The signs are there!
Imagine if he had a real VU.
If his voice were inhibited by his mask. He would have a baneish sound. "You merely adopted trinity force! I was born in it, molded by it."

Maybe he's the same kind of being Bard is, but a deviant. Both wear masks and have 3 fingers. Since they threw away the whole Institute of War lore thing, they can easily make his Lantern something he's always had.
Maybe, since Bard's role is protecting ancient artifacts, Jax's role is to guide those worth of them and/or defend them from the baddies.
Or maybe he's just the fuckin champ
Imagine if he had a real coat!
Also, question.  What even IS Jax?
I think he is an ionian like master yi... apparently all ionian males have like 7 eyes, not the females, no 7 eyes for irelia

Master Yi's goggles were made by Heimerdinger in the old lore, and they're called the 7 Len's of Insight or something like that.

I dunno how Heimer expects Yi to see through 7 different lenses, but hey, I guess it just works somehow
Science bitch
What about {{champion:157}}
Oh my god... Yasuo must be female... he doesn't have enough eyes to be male

HE'S TOO ASIAN???!?!?

eat an orange and be k
{{champion:17}}

Oranges = K.
Teemo = not K.

So by process of logical reasoning. If Teemo eats an orange, they would cancel each other out and both cease to be.

> [{quoted}](name=PhoenixSlayer13,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=3gwb5t8m,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-07-08T01:24:21.243+0000)
>
> Also, question.  What even IS Jax?

He is Michelangelo from TNMT.
He the son of master yi and baron nasher
yi  confirm female
the darkin lamppost
No
Jax only has 3 fingers

I just realized.
Jax is blue, has a lamp as part of his character, and has 3 fingers on each hand
The Genie in Aladdin is blue, has a lamp, and has 3 fingers on each hand.

still waiting for taric rework
http://i.imgur.com/2Q1G7Qf.jpg
The last of the pizza feet. . .
You forgot {{champion:82}} on that, the pizza feet are strong with him as well.

Those aren't actually pizza feet.
It's the remains from all those double kill jungler ganks just piling up over the years.

They guy just refuses to take a shower.
Makes sense, and seeing as metal rusts I can see why he wouldn't want to shower.
His feet crack me up
In the trailer he isn't even purple! He's more of a badass scarlet red.
They'll probably give him a VU when they finally decide who/what Jax actually is, which based on the pace of lore development could be several years out (not even joking).
{{champion:24}} and {{champion:2}} BADLY need VU's but no one seems to notice. Thanks for finally pointing it out OP.
omfg i agree with you on so many levels rito pls fix jax XD{{champion:24}}
Reminds me of a hipster Bard.

Yea Jax as well as a few last outdated champions (from 2009) ({{champion:32}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:24}}  {{champion:54}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:26}}{{champion:13}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:13}}  {{champion:36}}) Need some LOVE! IMO, all those champs listed above need visual upgrade! (because they are 6 years old now)

I understand that updating champs need time, but if its too hard to give them a Sion-scale vu, just give them an Alistar or Singed or Maokai scale VU, but give them something, RIOT please {{item:3151}}
{{champion:34}}

No {{champion:34}} because [she had a TU in 2013](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2013/12/anivia-texture-update-in-315.html) and her VO is not empty. There is worse like the champs i listed above, they are critical case :(
Everything but her newest two skins still look awful.
we get a battle worn jax with duct tape on his lamp... still sounds cool hitting turrets thou
I would have preferred he do more than dance around Darius and then die to Naut. When I first say The champ in the trailer is expected hardcover asskicking.
Same. I play a lot of Jax and I was hoping we would get to see his late game. Looked like laning phase to me...

Everyone's was... that was some silliness @ level 5, why do you think Ahri didn't ult around until the very end- she had just hit 6. Also Leona didn't ult everyone at the beginning. 
Rengo must have gotten several successful ganks/counterjungles because he's very ahead. Darius obviously killed Jax 2-3 times right out of the gates. Leona was roaming and then leeching exp from midlane without a kill, so Graves got some solo exp to have his ult against Naut.

Definitely like 6-10 minutes in.
LOOK BUDDY, EGGPLANT OR BUST
But what is he?
He's the champ!
